long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Have you ever struggled to find short video ad materials, hoping for a tool that can easily help you? The short video ad material library is your savior!

ğŸ‰ Feature Highlights:
ğŸ”¥ Massive ad materials: We have over 600,000 TikTok short video ad materials, covering various ad styles and ad themes, providing endless ad inspiration for your ad content production.
ğŸ”¥ Capture ad metadata: You can also capture a large amount of ad-related metadata directly from the platform. With detailed ad data information, you can fully understand the quality of your saved ad, including: â— fb ad library/meta ad library â— TikTok creative center, TikTok ad library (TikTok commercial content library).
ğŸ”¥ Intelligent search: Search by ad keywords or browse ad categories to quickly find the ad materials you need.
ğŸ”¥ Batch download: One-click download, easily save materials to devices, and use them anytime
ğŸ’¡ The short video ad material library is not only an ad material library, but also a powerful assistant for your content production. Whether it is making ad short videos, ad graphics, or other forms of ad media content, it can help you find the most suitable ad materials and make your ad creation more outstanding.

Function upgrade:
Folder classification: Users can create folders of different levels according to their preferences and habits, and set appropriate names and attributes for each folder. You can quickly locate the target file.
Convenient screenshot: Easily achieve webpage screenshot function, providing powerful assistance for your ad analysis and research.

With this powerful tool, you will be able to more accurately monitor and analyze competing product ad campaigns, quickly obtain valuable information, optimize ad strategies, and achieve a leap in work efficiency.
